mapper.select: SELECT continentNumber AS number, koreanName, englishName FROM continentTable ORDER BY koreanName ASC;
SELECT countryNumber AS number, koreanName, englishName, countryLat, countryLng FROM countryTable ORDER BY koreanName ASC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO countryTable(continentNumber, englishName, koreanName, countryLat, countryLng) VALUES (#{continentNumber}, #{englishName}, #{koreanName}, #{countryLat} , #{countryLng});
INSERT INTO areaTable(countryNumber, englishName, koreanName, areaLat, areaLng) VALUES (#{countryNumber}, #{englishName}, #{koreanName}, #{areaLat} , #{areaLng});
mapper.select: SELECT englishName FROM countryTable WHERE countryNumber = #{countryNumber}
